EN.NO_INFO2: Please modify your search criteria and try again.
EN.MSG_1: Use the search bar above to search for anything on the site.
EN.MSG_2: Currently the search only includes users, but in the future, items from the marketplace, resources and groups from Japanese Town and Regional Information Center will be displayed.
EN.MSG_3: Check back from time to time!
EN.INFO_CENTER1: Future home of regional information center search results.
EN.INFO_CENTER2: You will be able to get resources and find others wherever you are in the world. Search for answers to questions related to travelling and living in an area.
EN.TOWN1: Future home of the Japanese Town search results.
EN.TOWN2: You will be able search for groups to practice writing and reading Japanese. Find answers questions related to the Japanese language.
EN.MARKET1: Future home of the Marketplace search results.
EN.MARKET2: You will be able search for items others are offering or selling. Help save the environment and reuse whenever possible.

JA.NO_INFO: 当てはまる検索結果がありません
JA.NO_INFO2: 検索用語を変更して、再度検索してください。

JA.MSG_2: 現在ユーザーしか検索できませんが、マーケットのアイテム、英語街と地域案内センターのグループと情報が検索できます。
JA.MSG_3: 出来上がるまで少々お待ちください！
JA.INFO_CENTER1: 将来の地域案内センター検索結果ページ
JA.INFO_CENTER2: 世界中どこにいてもリソースを入手したり、他の人を見つけたりすることができます。旅行やその地域での生活に関する質問への回答を検索します。
